layoutAnnotations.One Card: A single card providing context to a current situation.
layoutAnnotations.Three Card: A simple divinatory layout presenting past, present, and future.
layoutAnnotations.Five Card: A more nuanced layout relating the current context to advice.
layoutAnnotations.Celtic Cross: A spread of ten cards presenting additional context about a situation.
layoutAnnotations.Major Arcana: A simple way to see all of the major arcana in the deck.

layouts.Background: Context or past history about the situation.
layouts.Hidden Influence: Hidden factors that are potentially influencing the analysis
